message: Bob, let's start with a reasonable offer. I take $55, you take $45.  A deal now is better than less money later.

Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I think we can do better. Let's split the money more evenly. I'll take $51 and you take $49.  We both get a slightly bigger share this way, and we avoid the risk of losing money in the next round.
Bob, time is money! Let's settle this now. I'll take a small hit and reduce my share to $53. You get $47, which is more than you would've gotten last round. Don't be greedy!
